Smart Attendance System

About

Try Geofencing NOW!!

Geofence Setup

Step 1: Geofence Setup

Administrators define geofences around specific locations such as office premises, classrooms, or event venues.

Step 2: Mobile App Installation

Users install the attendance system's mobile app on their smartphones.

Step 3: Geofence Detection

As users enter or exit a geofenced area, the mobile app sends location updates to the attendance system.

Face Recognition

Step 4: Face Recognition

The attendance system uses face recognition technology to identify the user within the geofenced area.

Step 5: Attendance Recording

Upon successful face recognition, the system records the user's attendance in the geofenced area.

Step 6: Notification and Alerts

The attendance system provides administrators with comprehensive reports and analytics, allowing them to track attendance, generate reports, and analyze patterns.

What we can do for you/

Geofence Setup

Administrators or system managers define the geofences by specifying the latitude and longitude coordinates or drawing boundaries on a map. These geofences can be set up around specific locations such as office premises, classrooms, or event venues.

What we can do for you/

User Enrollement

Each individual who needs to be tracked by the attendance system is registered and associated with their unique identifier, such as an employee ID, student ID, or any other relevant identification.

What we can do for you/

Mobile App Integration

Users are required to install a dedicated mobile application on their smartphones, which interfaces with the attendance system. The app will access the device's GPS functionality to determine the user's location

What we can do for you/

Geofence Detection

As users enter or exit a geofenced area, the mobile app sends location updates to the attendance system. The system compares these updates with the predefined geofences and determines whether the user is within the designated area or has left it.

What we can do for you/

Attendance Recording

When a user enters a geofenced area, the system logs their attendance, along with a timestamp. This information is stored in a database for further processing and analysis

What we can do for you/

Notification and Alerts

The attendance system provides administrators with access to comprehensive reports and analytics. They can view attendance records, generate attendance reports, analyze patterns, identify trends, and gain insights into attendance data
